Description:
Detects embedding of files with usage of steghide binary, the adversaries may use this technique to prevent the detection of hidden information.

Author: Pawel Mazur
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Steganography Hide Files with Steghide
Query: sourcetype='linux-auditd' eql select * from _source_ where type = 'execve' and a0 = 'steghide' and a1 = 'embed' and (a2 = '-cf' or a2 = '-ef') and (a4 = '-cf' or a4 = '-ef')
